scripts.install:all: cd portfolio && npm i --force && cd ../terminal-app && npm i --force
scripts.build: cd portfolio && npm run build && cd ../terminal-app && npm run build
scripts.gh-pages: cd portfolio && gh-pages -d public -b master -m "Deploying to master branch"
scripts.deploy: npm run install:all && npm run build && npm run copy && npm run gh-pages
